about_the_game:
Football Career Mode 26 is a straightforward football manager game in which you can manage a club of your choice.

Whether you want to lead an unknown club to international success or continue the history of a successful club, each club offers a different challenge. Through careful squad composition, infrastructure upgrades and the right decisions, you can win titles with your club.

Choose a club, choose a sponsor, and your football manager career can begin!

Features

  • 39 leagues from 25 different countries. National and international cup competitions

  • Complete club takeover without risk of dismissal or club takeover under conditions set by the club board. You decide!

  • Choose a sponsor at the start of each season with varying effects on your club's finances and fans' expectations

  • Determine the formation, line-up and tactical direction of your team based on player ratings, player fitness and player morale

  • Follow your club's matches in the visual simulation or use the quick simulation to avoid wasting time

  • Transfer players from other clubs to your team

  • Sign talents from the youth academy

  • Set up a scouting network and discover players for the youth academy

  • Upgrade the infrastructure of your club

  • Extend players' contracts or put them on the transfer or loan list

and much more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Football Career Mode 26

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Football Career Mode 26 is a straightforward football manager game. Choose a club, choose a sponsor and start your football manager career! Lead your club to the top through transfers, scouting, infrastructure updates and much more and win as many titles as possible!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean
